title: racial slurs and racism in league
body:
i DO NOT have any pictures of this event, i realized it after watching several league vids and my own experience. i have some examples in game.


######(no username allowed): wtf you (black racial slur) go be a gangster smoking (cannibis) or somethin

######: please you rice eating asian %%%got, learn to play the game, asian are suppose to be good, you disgrace 

######: 你他妈是不是美服的， 他妈是个傻逼
######（are you from NA? your are a mother******* %%%got)

its not even me who's talking stuff, it happens so much when someone gets Lucian and wins the game out of sheer mobility, these players should get banned, 3 weeks or perma, it aint funny to be racist, its offensive. im already reading comments about "WTF dude learn to fucking take a joke lol"
im asian, maybe i yell at my team when they feed for no reason. but is it funny to shame me on my asianess when i make bad plays?

replies.body: sorry if i cant spell, i m asian
Lmao, you're a shit disturber aren't you

This might be a little off topic but I dont get why people make these posts with the "In League" part.... as if this only happens in League. Its common on the entire internet, not even just gaming. That doesn't make it wrong. You can report and move on, making a general post about it is eh?
It's 2017 and racism is still a thing...
Racism is just another form of bullying. Grown men and women looking for reasons they are better than others
